publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7367 Jackie Baillie: Ship Welder of the Yearâ€”That the Parliament congratulates David Crawford from Dumbarton on being named the best trainee welder in the United Kingdom; understands that David saw off competition from 10 other finalists from six shipyards across the country to win the ShipWeld accolade; considers that David had to put his skills to the test by undertaking three rigorous welding tests plus a six-hour welding contest in the final; notes that David was also successful in the team competition, winning first place with his BAE Systems Govan colleague, and applauds what it considers the hard work and dedication that David and all of the other apprentices displayed by taking part in the competition.
S3M-7367 Ship Welder of the Year (lodged on 9 November 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Sarah Boyack*, John Park*, David Stewart*, James Kelly*, Hugh Henry*, Karen Whitefield*, Bob Doris*
S3M-7367 Ship Welder of the Year (lodged on 9 November 2010) Mary Mulligan*, David Whitton*, Elaine Smith*, Maureen Watt*, Gil Paterson*
